name: Ovelhinhas Voajantes
description:
Move the little dog with WASD and the the big doggo with the arrows.  You should move them concomitantly, alternatively you can move one and have a friend move the other one.

Get the sheep to enter the corral(?) before the time ends or the fox eat them.

This little game was made for LAJE 2021 (Eletronic Games Learning Lab) organized by GDP UFRJ.

Our team was:

Hugo Forte and Carolina Sá (as GDP supervisors)

Fernanda Prazeres (@fefeprazeres on instagram) [Developer]

Athos Balmant [Developer]

Jade Feydit [Game Design]

Lia [Art]

Julie França [Art]

me -> Gabriel Conde (@weeaboorori on twitter) [SFX and Music]
